name: Nell Carter
description:
We've profiled black Jews (Sammy Davis Jr., Yaphet Kotto, etc).

We've profiled gay Jews (Sandra Bernhard, Barney Frank, etc).

We've profiled fat Jews (Mama Cass, Jonah Hill, etc).

We've profiled Jews who won Emmys (Rhea Perlman, Lisa Kudrow, etc).

We've profiled Jews who won Tonys (Jason Alexander, Matthew Broderick, etc).

We've even profiled Jews who won both a Tony and an Emmy (Barry Manilow, Mel Brooks, etc).

But black, gay, fat, Tony/Emmy winning Jews?

This one is a first.
